document_data.name: Shou Embassy
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shou Embassy''' in the city of [[Bral]] was the home of the embassy of the Empire of [[Shou Lung]] on the [[Rock of Bral]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Shou Embassy was located in the [[Bral/Low City|Low City]] on the docking, or leading, edge of the Rock,
document_data.Structure: The Embassy did not look like it belonged among all the warehouses of the docking edge. It was an ornate building of clearly [[Shou]] architecture. The cornices of its roof had crouching gilded [[Lung dragon|dragons]], and sculpted [[bronze]] snarling [[foo creature]]s guarded the doors.
document_data.Interior: The building was divided into many small but fancy inner rooms for receiving guests.
document_data.Inhabitants: As late as [[1367 DR]], Lord [[Chan Fu Wi]] served as ambassador for Shou Lung. He was in magical direct contact with the imperial court on [[Toril]] by means of a [[wu jen]] assistant.
